colour.models.dataset.color_match_rgb Module¶

ColorMatch RGB Colourspace¶

Defines the ColorMatch RGB colourspace:

  • COLOR_MATCH_RGB_COLOURSPACE.

See also

RGB Colourspaces IPython Notebook

References

[1]Lindbloom, B. (2014). RGB Working Space Information. Retrieved April 11, 2014, from http://www.brucelindbloom.com/WorkingSpaceInfo.html
colour.models.dataset.color_match_rgb.COLOR_MATCH_RGB_PRIMARIES = array([[ 0.63 , 0.34 ], [ 0.295, 0.605], [ 0.15 , 0.075]])¶

ColorMatch RGB colourspace primaries.

COLOR_MATCH_RGB_PRIMARIES : ndarray, (3, 2)

colour.models.dataset.color_match_rgb.COLOR_MATCH_RGB_ILLUMINANT = u'D50'¶

ColorMatch RGB colourspace whitepoint name as illuminant.

colour.models.dataset.color_match_rgb.COLOR_MATCH_RGB_TO_XYZ_MATRIX = array([[ 0.50933743, 0.32090983, 0.13396473], [ 0.27488052, 0.65813712, 0.06698237], [ 0.02425416, 0.10878299, 0.69215113]])¶

ColorMatch RGB colourspace to CIE XYZ tristimulus values matrix.

COLOR_MATCH_RGB_TO_XYZ_MATRIX : array_like, (3, 3)

colour.models.dataset.color_match_rgb.XYZ_TO_COLOR_MATCH_RGB_MATRIX = array([[ 2.64232075, -1.22344247, -0.39301926], [-1.11196676, 2.05900066, 0.01596125], [ 0.08217251, -0.28073448, 1.45603468]])¶

XYZ_TO_COLOR_MATCH_RGB_MATRIX : array_like, (3, 3)
